text:
Namirial is a
trust service provider in Italy.

We basically cover
from the identity

to the signature
of our customers

and to the end of the documents
or the rest of the documents

using the LTA system, which is
the Long-Term Archiving system.

Namirial customers
usually are banks,

insurance, enterprises,
but even also other kinds of

small and medium companies
all around the world.
AWS helped us with Amazon Bedrock

to start our journey
in generative AI

because we had the opportunity
to test a lot of models

because we had the opportunity
to test a lot of models

without changing any single
line of code or our APIs.

We integrated Amazon Bedrock
and all the generative AI

models that we are using
in eSignAnywhere,

which is a signature
orchestrator,

and it helps our customers
to better understand
what they are signing.

We want to test other
generative AI services in AWS.
One of the most important things

that we want to create
is an assistant

that can read and create
some executive reports

for our business leadership,
starting from our

FinOps dashboard that we have
in Amazon QuickSight.

We love AWS
because we have a lot of services
already ready for what we need.

What we need in the place we want
and with the security layer

that it is recommended
from the law.
